abstract: Hungarian right-wing lawmaker Bela Kovacs is stripped of immunity by European Parliament pending investigation into allegations of spying on European Union for Russia.
lead_paragraph: Hungarian prosecutors said covert contacts between the official, Bela Kovacs of the far-right party Jobbik, and Russian intelligence officers were first detected in 2010.

headline.main: Hungary: European Parliament Lifts Immunity for Spy Suspect
headline.print_headline: Europe; Hungary: European Parliament Lifts Immunity for Spy Suspect

snippet: Hungarian prosecutors said covert contacts between the official, Bela Kovacs of the far-right party Jobbik, and Russian intelligence officers were first detected in 2010.
